headline: American Tower Corporation (AMT) Faces Dish Wireless Lease Default, But Analysts Remain Cautiously Optimistic
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On January 28, in regulatory filings, American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) reiterated that Dish Wireless has defaulted in lease payments. Consequently, the company is in default under the Strategic Collaboration Agreement entered into in 2021. American Tower Corporation insists that the default will […]

headline: AT&T Deepens Fiber And Cloud Role With Amazon Deals And Lumen Buy
summary: AT&T (NYSE:T) entered new partnerships with Amazon Web Services and Amazon Leo to modernize U.S. connectivity infrastructure. The collaboration focuses on combining AT&T's fiber network with cloud, AI, and satellite capabilities, including broadband reach into underserved areas. AT&T also closed its acquisition of Lumen's mass-market fiber business, adding millions of fiber locations to its network. For you as an investor, AT&T sits at the intersection of wireless, fiber broadband, and...
